author: mherndon
msg: LUCENENET-439, LUCENENET-438, LUCENENET-436. Added categories constant for Nunit Category attribute. cleaning up tests and classes that they touch starting in the Analysis namespace.  TokenStream, Analyzer, AlreadyClosedException was cleaned up, Attribute interface was change to IAttribute.

author: rhuijben
msg: * STATUS: Update comment and nominate r1150242

author: rhuijben
msg: Partially revert r1143778 as svn_txdelta_apply() doesn't close the source
stream in time to allow deleting. This can make us hit the wait loop on
Windows, when the file can't be deleted.
(The delay loop was hit from an AnkhSVN development snapshot)
(file_rev_handler): Store the source stream in the baton and pass a disowned

author: todd
msg: Move SecondaryNameNode.rollForwardByApplyingEdits to Checkpointer. Remove unused code in EditLogBackupInputStream
